bullets.habitat: Kelp forests and coastal waters of the North Pacific
bullets.diet: Sea urchins, crabs, mollusks, and fish - up to 25% of body weight daily
bullets.personality: Playful, curious, and incredibly social - they hold hands while sleeping!

bullets.habitat: Rocky dens in cold Pacific waters, from shallow tide pools to 2000ft deep
bullets.diet: Crabs, shrimp, fish, and sharks - they're surprisingly fierce hunters
bullets.personality: Intelligent problem-solvers with unique personalities and excellent memories

bullets.habitat: Coastal waters, harbors, and beaches throughout the North Pacific
bullets.diet: Fish, squid, and crustaceans - they're excellent underwater acrobats
bullets.personality: Curious and adaptable, often seen 'spy-hopping' to check out humans

bullets.habitat: Rocky crevices and caves in Pacific waters from Alaska to California
bullets.diet: Sea urchins, crabs, and mollusks - their powerful jaws crush shells easily
bullets.personality: Gentle giants that mate for life and share parenting duties

bullets.habitat: Rocky reefs and underwater structures in the North Pacific
bullets.diet: Small fish, crustaceans, and squid - they're ambush predators
bullets.personality: Long-lived homebodies that can live over 100 years in the same area

bullets.habitat: Shallow coastal waters, coral reefs, and sandy flats in tropical Indo-Pacific
bullets.diet: Small fish, crustaceans, and mollusks - they're gentle bottom feeders
bullets.personality: Docile and curious, often resting on sandy bottoms during the day

bullets.habitat: Surface waters of oceans worldwide - true cosmopolitan travelers
bullets.diet: Plankton, small fish, and other jellies caught in their trailing tentacles
bullets.personality: Graceful drifters that pulse rhythmically through the water like living art
